title: Install problem
body: I was playing a rank game when suddenly my internet drops out. i restarted my pc then tried opening league and i got a "RADS error" i open and closed league many times but it still wouldnt open so i uninstalled league and tryied to reinstall but when i reinstalled i wouldnt install and came up with a page that said Oops! Google Chrome could not connect to l3cdn.riotgames.com. Can anyone help?
